name: Caroline
result: Can you see the tails? The comet is on a trajectory â€“ and so are we. We need to avoid hitting both the comet and one of the tails, while we can go through the other.

name: Raymonde
result: I know you want to retrieve that frame, but it's too dangerous to leave the spaceship because of the radiation. We must use the space drone. To do this, use a secret code.

name: Hypatia
result: It looks almost like a wire that is untwisting itself. Let me help you fetch it. Perhaps you can solve an equation for me.

name: Mary
result: Why don't you extend your robotic arm and try to collect some?
